channel.title: R on ALLAN V. C. QUADROS
channel.description: Recent content in R on ALLAN V. C. QUADROS

item.title: Announcing the 'emstreeR' package
item.description: Everyone who is addicted to R dreams about making his/her first package. An even bigger dream is to make your package available on CRAN - The Comprehensive R Archive Network. That being said, I am proud to announce my first R package: emstreeR. It is available on CRAN since the beginning of December 2018. emstreeR is a package for fast and easily computing Euclidean Minimum Spanning Trees.

item.title: Scraping Google News with 'rvest'
item.description: This is an example of how to scrape Google News with the awesome rvest package. This work is the result of a question that came up on the WhatsApp group of our site blackbeltR. A user came up with this problem and I decided to help him. It was a cool challenge, so why not? A great deal of the basic ideas comes from his own code. I just kept it and added few things in order to get the code working.
